chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to play?
yes
alright! i start at the twig
where to now, mate?
go straight
alright, now i'm on the small island with the tiger
where to next?
continue to go straight
cool, i'm standing with the parrot on the big island now, what's next?
make a turn and go pass the rocks
okay, done! now i'm on the new island with the frog
where should i go next?
make a turn and go pass the crocodile and meet the elephant
done! now i'm back on the big island with the elephant
what's next boss?
go straight until meet the giraffe
alright, now i'm standing with the giraffe
what's next?
make a turn and go straight until meet the snake
got it! now i'm standing with the snake
continue to go straight and you will see the treasure
awesome, found the treasure! *finished* thanks, buddy! this was lots of fun!

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to play?
yes
awesome! alright, from our start point, take a walk towards the left, under the bench, and across a trail heading towards a florist stand

but hold up, don't go all the way! turn around, we're gonna trick that florist! 

when you turnaround, you'll see the white dog you started from. head back there, cross the trail, you're doing great!
I passed the trail what's next
good job! now skip over that wooden branch to your south and keep moving down
say hi to another white dog near a red and white checkered picnic
I'm on the picnic blanket what's next
munch on those berries if you want, but keep heading west
got it?
can you make it simpler
of course, champ! walk over the mat, touch that bowl of berries and keep going towards left
Do I need to cross any of the branch
you're doing just fine! yes, cross that wooden branch again, but this time move north
after that, you'll be by the river
which branch
move a little to the left, champ! you'll see it crossing the river
cross that one! watch your step!
I'm near the bridge
perfect! be sly like a fox, circle right around that green bush before you reach the florist stand
don't touch it though!
I'm in front of the florist stand
doing great! now turn left, head down below the florist stand towards the big bridge with the cyclists on it
I'm on the bridge
groovy! keep moving west, pass the bridge
just a bit more!
I passed the bridge next to the veggie stand
fantastic! see the elderly couple on the bench? that's your next point
be respectful and go quietly around them
Ok I'm in front of them
you're nailing it! now, take a few steps south, between the bench and another wooden branch
ok
at the end of that little walk, there's a green bush
make your way to it, you're almost there!

chat.msg: hola, estas listo?
yes
cool! we're up north by the tent
how do we start?
go straight and around the dog
alright, just passed the dog
fire or mushroom next?
turn around in front of the fire and turn around under the mushroom
okay, turning around the fire and going under the mushroom now
what's next?
make a u turn right there and continue to go straight
got it! making a u-turn and straight ahead towards the blue car
now what?
no don't meet the blue car u turn right where the car is
hellp
continue to go straight'
go straight
go straight
alright, passing by the blue car, straight towards the telescope
what's next?
make a u turn passed the telescope and head toward the wooden house
perfect! making a u-turn past the telescope, and heading towards the house now
*finished*

chat.msg: hi there! que comience el juego!!
alright, let's start our little adventure! first, take a step to the south-west, under the first palm tree
now, turn right, pass the second palm tree and then take a sharp left before the third one. head south!
I'm next to the speaker
awesome! now, veer slightly left and head northwest
you should be going between the red tent on your left and the speaker on your right
I'm between them
perfecto! now, let's make a lil' detour, circle around the tent in an arc
fun right? after that, start heading south
I'm next to the rock
okay cool, proceed along the path, but don't enter the water just yet
turn right just before the shore, heading west under the red kayak
I'm next to the kayak
great! now turn right to face north and walk along the length of the kayak

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: When they can't think of a word in their native tongue but knows the word in second language
